title: Can someone help me fix this?
body: I started a game and noticed it was a bit laggy so I went to the options the change the resolution and the moment I pressed it the screen went completely black then it closed the window. So I tried restarting league and it was still black, so I restarted my PC and then opened league again and yet it is still black. Nothing is working so far and I don't want to get a ban for no reason! Does anyone know how to fix this annoying problem?

replies.body: It sounds like you may have mistakenly toggled a Full-Screen mode. If you hit **ALT+ENTER**, does it resolve the issue for you?
